content.value: Mandala Hostel is a peaceful sanctuary in the very heart of the bustling city of Bogota.With its affordable prices, cozy rooms and outstanding services. Also enjoy our yoga classes every morning, they are good for recovery your body from long distance travels.

Mandala Hostel is just a 5 to 10-minute drive away from the Airport, Botanical Garden, Simon Bolivar Central Park, Salitre Theme Park, and Maloka Theme Park. There’s a whole array of shopping centers, restaurants, gyms and other shops within walking distance from the hostel.
We even arrange for Airport-to-Hostel taxi services for the same price as an Uber.

Important Amenities
We offer 4 types of accommodations for our guests:
1.2-Beds Dorms (Cozy wood room with a garden view)
2.6-Beds Dorms
3.13-Beds Dorms
4.2 Private Rooms (1 with attached bathroom and 1 without)
Our sophisticated capsule beds offer warmth, integrated lighting, and absolute privacy to you. A traditional breakfast including Toast, Eggs, Caffe or hot Chocolate greets you every morning.
We offer a fully stocked kitchen, equipped with a full range of kitchen appliances. We hold coctels and cooking activities to encourage such interactions among solo travelers.
We can even get you bicycles on rent for exploring the city. When you’re home, enjoy Netflix and some Xbox 360 gaming.

description.description:
Conscious Travelers - Vegetarian - Yoga - Urban Garden
Mandala Hostel is a peaceful sanctuary in the very heart of the bustling city of Bogota.With its affordable prices, cozy rooms and outstanding services. The Indian and Thai styled, mystic themed hostel is a rare retreat for your body, mind, and soul. The dormitories and private rooms offer unlimited Wi-Fi, unlimited local calls, and a stunning fireplace which will warm your heart the moment you step in.
